events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund or an exchange for a different size.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and exchange.
Assigning this refund request case to Agent Emily, who specializes in returns and exchanges.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund or exchange for the jacket you purchased. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 1234567890 and the jacket is brand new, only tried on once. There is no damage or defect at all.
Thank you for the details. We can provide you with a full refund or an exchange for a different size. Please let us know your preference and we will send you a prepaid return label.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer to get a refund. Please send me the return label at your earliest convenience.
We have emailed the prepaid return shipping label to you. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund immediately. Thank you for your cooperation.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and that the refund has been processed after the item was returned.
Yes, I received the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. I also noticed the refund was credited to my account. Thank you very much!
We are glad your refund was processed successfully. Closing the case now, and please reach out anytime for further assistance.
You will shortly receive a satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is appreciated.
